segments.text: My eyes are drawn to that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly wobbly from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed outwards, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he could lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is definitely tilted backward, almost tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about him falling and hurting himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash if he goes down with that cookie jar!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really ought to secure that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This precarious situation is making me quite uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a nasty fall is very real.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a terrible accident that would be.
segments.speaker: PAR
